ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Vessel Pollution and Dangerous Chemicals Regulations
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE VESSEL POLLUTION AND DANGEROUS CHEMICALS REGULATIONS in order to implement new standards set out under the International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships (MARPOL) Annex VI to reduce air pollution and greenhouse gas emissions from vessels.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0068 Publication Date: 2013-05-08
